title: Malaria resistance-related biological adaptation and complex evolutionary footprints inferred from one integrative Tai-Kadai-related genomic resource
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Shuhan Duan, Mengge Wang, Zhiyong Wang, Yan Liu, Xiucheng Jiang, Haoran Su, Yan Cai, Qiuxia Sun, Yuntao Sun, Xiangping Li, Jing Chen, Yijiu Zhang, Jiangwei Yan, Shengjie Nie, Liping Hu, Renkuan Tang, Libing Yun, Chuan-Chao Wang, Chao Liu, Junbao Yang
